DOC.criteria: Generally healthy Female participant must nonchildbearing potential Nonsmoker use nicotine nicotinecontaining product least 6 month History clinically significant psychiatric disorder last 5 10 year History stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder History clinically significant endocrine , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hematological , hepatic , immunological , renal , respiratory , genitourinary abnormality diseases History neoplastic disease Excessive consumption alcohol ( 3 drinks/day ) caffeinated beverage ( 6 servings/day ) Major surgery , donate lose 1 unit blood within 4 week Participated another investigational study within 4 week History significant drug allergy clinically significant adverse experience relate EMENDâ„¢ , dexamethasone , ondansetron History significant multiple and/or severe allergy History anaphylactic reaction significant intolerability prescription nonprescription drug food Current drug/alcohol abuse , history within 2 year Participation PET study study involve administration radioactive substance ionize radiation within prior 12 month Extensive radiological examination within prior 12 month Magnetizable metal prosthesis device ( Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) hazard ) History claustrophobia
